entry.title: Awesome Seml Updates on May 03 - May 09, 2021
entry.content:
Tooling

  • Alibi Detect (‚≠ê2.4k) - Python library focused on outlier, adversarial and drift detection.
  • PyTorch Lightning (‚≠ê30k) - The lightweight PyTorch wrapper for high-performance AI research. Scale your models, not the boilerplate.
  • Robustness Metrics (‚≠ê470) - Lightweight modules to evaluate the robustness of classification models.
  • Seldon Core (‚≠ê4.6k) - An MLOps framework to package, deploy, monitor and manage thousands of production machine learning models on Kubernetes.
  • Tensorflow Data Validation (TFDV) (‚≠ê772) - Library for exploring and validating machine learning data. Similar to Great Expectations, but for Tensorflow data.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on May 03 - May 09, 2021

entry.content:

  • FairLearn - A toolkit to assess and improve the fairness of machine learning models.
  • Great Expectations (‚≠ê11k) - Data validation and testing with integration in pipelines.
  • LiFT (‚≠ê172) - Linkedin fairness toolkit.
  • Model Card Toolkit (‚≠ê434) - Streamlines and automates the generation of model cards; for model documentation.

entry.title: Awesome Seml Updates on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2020
entry.content:
Model Training

  • Nitpicking Machine Learning Technical Debt

Tooling

  • Airflow - Programmatically author, schedule and monitor workflows.
  • Data Version Control (DVC) - DVC is a data and ML experiments management tool.
  • Facets Overview / Facets Dive - Robust visualizations to aid in understanding machine learning datasets.
  • Git Large File System (LFS) - Replaces large files such as datasets with text pointers inside Git.
  • HParams (‚≠ê126) - A thoughtful approach to configuration management for machine learning projects.
  • Kubeflow - A platform for data scientists who want to build and experiment with ML pipelines.
  • Label Studio (‚≠ê23k) - A multi-type data labeling and annotation tool with standardized output format.
  • MLFlow - Manage the ML lifecycle, including experimentation, deployment, and a central model registry.
  • Neptune.ai - Experiment tracking tool bringing organization and collaboration to data science projects.
  • Neuraxle (‚≠ê613) - Sklearn-like framework for hyperparameter tuning and AutoML in deep learning projects.
  • OpenML - An inclusive movement to build an open, organized, online ecosystem for machine learning.
  • Spark Machine Learning - Spark‚Äôs ML library consisting of common learning algorithms and utilities.
  • TensorBoard - TensorFlow's Visualization Toolkit.
  • Tensorflow Extended (TFX) - An end-to-end platform for deploying production ML pipelines.
  • Weights & Biases - Experiment tracking, model optimization, and dataset versioning.
entry.summary: 16 awesome projects updated on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2020
